content: मथन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [मथ् ल्यु ल्युट् वा] {@--1@} Churning, stirring up. {@--2@} Hurting, injuring. {@--3@} Killing, destroying, a destroyer; मुग्धे मधुमथनमनुगतमनुसर राधिके <ls>Gīt. 2.</ls> {@--4@} Rubbing. --नः <ab>N.</ab> of a tree (गणिकारिका, used in producing fire by attrition). --नं {@--1@} Churning, stirring round, agitating. {@--2@} Rubbing, friction. {@--3@} Injury, hurting. destruction.
